Description: Secure Production Environment - VPC, RDS, EC2, Lambda, ALB, S3, CloudTrail, CloudWatch, and KMS

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix for resource naming (e.g., dev, staging, prod)

LogRetentionInDays.Description: Number of days to retain CloudWatch logs

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer
Security group for EC2 instances - allows traffic from ALB only
Security group for RDS - allows access from EC2 instances only
Security group for Lambda functions in VPC - no public access

Properties.Description: KMS key for encrypting S3 buckets, RDS, and other resources

Statement.Sid: Allow services to use the key

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alert when EC2 instance CPU usage is high
Alert when RDS CPU usage is high
Alert when Lambda function has errors

S3BucketName.Description: Name of the S3 bucket for application data

ALBDNSName.Description: DNS name of the Application Load Balancer

ALBArn.Description: ARN of the Application Load Balancer

KMSKeyId.Description: ID of the KMS key for encryption

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix used for this deployment
